title: Soul Snuffers

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Black) each night.
- (1): Attack a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of the game, every single player will be given a -1/-1 counter. It will reduce their Attack and Defense by 1 tier, to a minimum of None and Vulnerable respectively. Trying to attack someone, or being attacked, will use up a -1/-1 counter.

desc:
Post 1908
*They once sought to unite with the flame of transcendence. Now they seek only to extinguish the lights of others.*
